translated: Girolamo Francesco Maria Mazzola says he called Parmigianino Parmigianino in French (born in Parma in 1503 and died in 1540) was an Italian painter of the sixteenth century.
original: Girolamo Francesco Maria Mazzola dit il Parmigianino surnommé le Parmesan en français (né à Parme en 1503 et mort en 1540) est un peintre italien du XVIe siècle.
